languages.text: The Pet has +30 to its Key Stats for 1 round after using Overcharge. After that, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: The Pet has +30 to its Key Stats for 1 round after using Overcharge. After that, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g}, their familiar gains +30 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} применяет {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Перезарядку{/g}, его фамильяр получает +30 к своим ключевым {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. В следующем раунде этот бонус меняется на +10 и остается таким до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Overseer's heroic act or desperate measure is used, their familiar gains +30 to its key characteristics for 1 round. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда надзиратель применяет {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Перезарядку{/g}, его фамильяр получает +30 к своим ключевым характеристикам на 1 раунд. В следующем раунде этот бонус меняется на +10 и остается таким до конца боя.

Когда надзиратель применяет {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Перезарядку{/g}, его фамильяр получает +30 к своим ключевым характеристикам на 1 раунд. В следующем раунде этот бонус меняется на +10 и остается таким до конца боя.

languages.text: Setzt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Überladung{/g} ein, erhält sein Vertrauter 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +30 auf seine wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. In der nächsten Runde erhöht sich der Bonus auf +10 und hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g}, their familiar gains +30 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der Aufseher {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Überladung{/g} ein, erhält sein Vertrauter 1 Runde lang +30 auf seine wesentlichen Eigenschaften. In der nächsten Runde erhöht sich der Bonus auf +10 und hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} utilise {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Surcharge{/g}, son familier gagne +30 à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Lors du round suivant, le bonus passe à +10 et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g}, their familiar gains +30 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le surveillant utilise {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Surcharge{/g}, son familier gagne +30 à ses caractéristiques clés pendant 1 round. Lors du round suivant, le bonus passe à +10 et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}使用{g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}过度充能{/g}时，其使仆的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都提高30点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。下一轮时，此加成效果降为10点，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g}, their familiar gains +30 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当监察官使用{g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}过度充能{/g}时，其使仆的关键属性都提高30点，持续一轮。下一轮时，此加成效果降为10点，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} usa {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Sobrecarga{/g}, su familiar gana +30 a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} clave durante 1 asalto. El {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} siguiente, la bonificación baja a +10 y dura hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g}, their familiar gains +30 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor usa {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Sobrecarga{/g}, su familiar gana +30 a sus características clave durante 1 asalto. El asalto siguiente, la bonificación baja a +10 y dura hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}が{g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}オーバーチャージ{/g}を使用すると、ファミリアーは1ラウンドの間その主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+30される。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}でボーナスが+10になり、戦闘終了まで継続する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g}, their familiar gains +30 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The next round, the bonus becomes +10 and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 監督官が{g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}オーバーチャージ{/g}を使用すると、ファミリアーは1ラウンドの間その主要な特性が+30される。次のラウンドでボーナスが+10になり、戦闘終了まで継続する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Aşırı Yükleme{/g} kullandığında iyesi kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +30 puan kazanır. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Bir sonraki rauntta bonus +10 puana dönüşür ve bu kez çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
